event_name: TI News: Livestreams, Viewing Parties, and The Secret Shop

announcement_body.headline: TI News: Livestreams, Viewing Parties, and The Secret Shop
body: [img]{STEAM_CLAN_LOC_IMAGE}/3703047/37e5f9a6e890c17bfce076d5f1e20ab338289c4e.png[/img]

The Road to The International is literally right around the metaphorical corner, and that means a lot of cool and exciting stuff is revving to life. There are more ways than ever to enjoy the matches, meet new people, and show off your fandom, so we've put it all together in a single post so you don't miss out on any of the fun.
[h1]Event Livestreaming[/h1]

The start of Group Stage will be, let's be honest, barely controlled Dota chaos, with five simultaneous streams during the opening two days of Group Stage weekend to seed the tournament. But, starting this year, by this Saturday we'll be down to a single stream — which should make the back half of Group Stage weekend a lot easier to watch online.

And if you're [i]planning[/i] to watch online, we've got options for you. From Twitch to YouTube to SteamTV, The Road to the International and The International will be streamed on multiple platforms in multiple languages, making it easier than ever to follow the journeys of all your favorite teams as they vie for the Aegis of Champions.
[b]English[/b]

[url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti]Twitch[/url] | [url=https://www.youtube.com/@dota2/]YouTube[/url] | SteamTV [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198198486900]Stream A[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198239691668]Stream B[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198207546029]Stream C[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198321900250]Stream D[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198853270818]Stream E[/url]
[b]Chinese[/b]

[url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_cn]Twitch[/url] | [url=https://www.bilibili.com/blackboard/live/live-activity-player.html?cid=3336696&quality=0]Bilibili[/url] | SteamTV [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198208088121]Stream A[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198208089225]Stream B[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198208096163]Stream C[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198322056849]Stream D[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198853470419]Stream E[/url]
[b]Russian[/b]

[url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_ru]Twitch[/url] | [url=https://www.youtube.com/@dota2/]YouTube[/url] | SteamTV  [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198207552741] Stream A[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198239716708] Stream B[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198207580869] Stream C[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198321277386] Stream D[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561198853596449] Stream E[/url][url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561199561116887] Stream F[/url]
[b]Spanish[/b]

[url=https://www.twitch.tv/dota2ti_es]Twitch[/url] | [url=https://www.youtube.com/@dota2/]YouTube[/url] | [url=https://www.facebook.com/dota2/]Facebook[/url] | SteamTV [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561199212802637]Stream A[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561199212713691]Stream B[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561199212705375]Stream C[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561199212752258]Stream D[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/broadcast/watch/76561199212833895]Stream E[/url]

Not seeing your language represented? Don't worry! While the above links represent the official broadcasts, we understand Dota is played by folks everywhere around the world, and we've also handed out 15 broadcast licenses for other languages, so check in with your local communities to find out the best way to get online and watch.

Lastly, everyone in the Dota community is of course welcome to join in on the streaming fun if you're able and interested. We only ask that you follow our [url=https://www.dota2.com/dotatv]community streaming guidelines[/url].
[h1]Viewing Party Signups[/h1]

From bars, LAN cafes, movie theaters and even private homes, there's gonna be plenty of opportunities to get in on a "pubstomp" viewing party starting with the Playoffs weekend and throughout The International itself. We're even planning to include viewing party footage live during the final weekend of the event, so if you want to connect with other fans, experience amazing matches in a fun group atmosphere, [i]and[/i] be momentarily famous, the time to sign up is [url=https://www.barcraft.com/ti12/]now[/url].
If you're feeling ambitious and want to throw your [i]own[/i] viewing party, here's a list of organizer guides from Barcraft on how to host an event:
[list][*][b]English [/b]- [url=https://www.barcraft.com/static/2023_Barcraft_English_-_Viewing_Party_Organizer_Guide_DOTA2TI.pdf]Viewing Party Organizer's Guide[/url]
[*][b]Spanish [/b]- [url=https://www.barcraft.com/static/2023_Barcraft_Spanish_-_Viewing_Party_Organizer_Guide_DOTA2TI.pdf]Guía para organizadores de fiestas de visualización[/url]
[*][b]Russian [/b]- [url=https://www.barcraft.com/static/2023_Barcraft_Russian_-_Viewing_Party_Organizer_Guide_DOTA2TI.pdf]Руководство для организаторов Пабстомпов[/url]
[*][b]Polish [/b]- [url=https://www.barcraft.com/static/2023_Barcraft_Polish_-_Viewing_Party_Organizer_Guide_DOTA2TI.pdf]Przewodnik Organizatora Pubstompów[/url]
[*][b]Portuguese [/b]- [url=https://www.barcraft.com/static/2023_Barcraft_Portuguese_-_Viewing_Party_Organizer_Guide_DOTA2TI.pdf]Guia do Organizador de festas de exibição[/url]
[/list]
[h1]The Secret Shop is Open for Business[/h1]

The International 2023 Secret Shop has a little something for everybody interested in showing off their TI fandom. Looking to measure your mouse movement more accurately? We've got mousepads. Feeling cold and thirsty? We've got hoodies and tumblers. In the market for some mousepads, hoodies and tumblers but not sure how to carry it all around? Unfortunately, science has yet to invent a method of — no, just kidding. We've even got tote bags. Check out the shop [url=https://na.dota2secretshop.com/]here[/url].
